coffeeDrinks.name: Espresso
coffeeDrinks.description: A strong, full-bodied coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

coffeeDrinks.name: Cappuccino
coffeeDrinks.description: A rich coffee drink topped with steamed milk and foam, typically enjoyed in the morning.

coffeeDrinks.name: Latte
coffeeDrinks.description: A smooth, milky coffee made with espresso and steamed milk, often flavored with syrups.

coffeeDrinks.name: Americano
coffeeDrinks.description: A diluted espresso, giving a similar strength to regular coffee but with a unique flavor.

coffeeDrinks.name: Macchiato
coffeeDrinks.description: This is a small coffee drink made by adding a dash of milk or foam to a shot of espresso.

coffeeDrinks.name: Mocha
coffeeDrinks.description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

coffeeDrinks.name: Flat White
coffeeDrinks.description: A smooth, velvety coffee made with microfoam milk and espresso, less frothy than a latte.

coffeeDrinks.name: Irish Coffee
coffeeDrinks.description: It a is cocktail of coffee that mixed with Irish whiskey, sugar, and topped with cream.

coffeeDrinks.name: Iced Coffee
coffeeDrinks.description: Chilled coffee served over ice, often sweetened and sometimes with milk or cream.

coffeeDrinks.name: Affogato
coffeeDrinks.description: A dessert-like coffee drink with a scoop of vanilla ice cream or gelato topped with hot espresso.
